title: My Dongle is HUGE! - CalDigit
description: Thanks to CalDigit for sponsoring this video! Check their products out. CalDigit TS3 Plus:  CalDigit SOHO Dock:  CalDigit Tuff nano 512GB:  CalDigit Connect 10G:   USB-C or Thunderbolt hubs are getting increasingly popular due to laptops having fewer ports on the laptops themselves to make them more compact, but there's a ton out there to select from. Caldigit sent us a few of them to check out.
